segments.text: Let's go see pandas ! The news said that two pandas arrived at the zoo last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I would like to see cute pandas , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can take the MET and get off at the Zoo Station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( At the zoo ) Wow ! This zoo is really huge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you can find hundreds of various animals here . It is the biggest zoo in Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at the map . It has different areas , such as marine lives , mammals , polar animals and insects .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where can find the pandas ? I think we are here to see the pandas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have to go to the mammal area . We are at the gate right now . We need to go straight from here and turn left and go along to the end and make anotherleft turn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It should take at least 20 minutes to get there . Are there any shuttle buses running place to place around the whole zoo ?
segments.speaker: S1
